name: Cuentas por Cobrar 35 60 90
query:
select 
a.name as "Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:80",
a.customer as "Cliente::80",
case when a.name is null then null else a.customer end as "Nombre:Link/Customer:250",  
a.posting_date as "Fecha::100",
a.due_date as "Vencimiento::100",
a.currency as "Moneda",
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) <= 35
THEN a.outstanding_amount/a.conversion_rate  else null end) as "0-35:Currency:80",
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) >= 36 AND DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) <= 60 THEN a.outstanding_amount/a.conversion_rate else null end) as "35-60:Currency:80",
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) <= 90 THEN a.outstanding_amount/a.conversion_rate else null end) as "60-90:Currency:80", 
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), a.posting_date) > 90 THEN a.outstanding_amount/a.conversion_rate else null end) as "Mas 90:Currency:80",
a.agente as "Agente::50",
b.ruta as "Ruta::50"
from
`tabSales Invoice` a inner join tabCustomer b on a.customer = b.name
where a.posting_date >= %(a.from_date)s and a.posting_date <= %(a.to_date)s and a.docstatus = 1 and outstanding_amount != 0 and a.status != 'Paid'
GROUP BY a.CUSTOMER, a.name WITH ROLLUP;
